summary:
It continues!
Let your character look like Mystique from the X-MEN franchise!
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][center][b][color=#c9daf8][size=3]Do you want to play as Mystique in Skyrim
This mod is the perfect mod for you![/size][/color][/b]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/77333-8-1469357395.png[/img]

[b][color=#3c78d8][size=5]Permission[/size][/color]
[/b][size=3][color=#c9daf8]I like the idea of a follower mod. Just like with Harley Quinn, I can not do that myself.
If someome want to help me by making one out of the presets I made, contact me via PM.
[/color][u][color=#c9daf8][b]However, this preset has already a follower mod available at the Nexus![/b][/color][/u]
[/size]

[b][color=#3c78d8][size=5]FOLLOWER MOD!![/size]
[/color][/b]
[color=#c9daf8][size=3]Ladies and Gentlemen
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/35629995]mfeile1974[/url] did an amazing job by creating a follower out of this preset!
So check that out:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77839/?]Mystique - Standalone Follower Mod[/url][/size][/color]


[b][color=#3c78d8][size=5]Requirements:[/size][/color]
[/b][size=3][color=#c9daf8]RaceMenu
KS Hairdos
Fair skin complexion (with all the make-up features)

Born Dragon Skin - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/14844589]ZwabberdieBo[/url]
(This one is not required, but it makes the skin just like Mystique. Keep in mind that all female NPC's will look like this.)
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63680/?

If you use Custom Races, by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/716920]d_rail1602[/url], your character will be the only one with the scaled skin.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8720/?

The Dryad - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/726673]Xenius[/url]
(This mod is for the eyes!)
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21458/?[/color]
[/size]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/77333-3-1469357396.png[/img]

[color=#3c78d8][size=5][b]Recommended:[/b][/size][/color]
[color=#c9daf8][size=3]XP32 Skeleton Extended
UNP or CBBE bodytype. 
Bodyslide

There are some mods that make you shapeshift into animals. That might be a good idea for your gameplay!
[/size][/color][size=5]
[b][color=#3c78d8]Clothing:[/color][/b][/size]
[color=#c9daf8]HA! You really think she will wear clothes?
But if you don't want to walk around naked, than I suggest a blue bikini :p[/color]
[color=#3c78d8]
[/color][b][color=#3c78d8][size=5]I hope you will enjoy the mod![/size][/color]
[/b][color=#c9daf8][size=3]Let me know what you think about this. 
I accept requests for any other female characters from comics or games. Just let me know!
[/size][/color][color=#c9daf8][size=3]Be sure to check out my other mods, if you liked this preset! I have presets from DC villians and there will be more Marvel too![/size][/color][/center][color=#3c78d8][size=5]
[/size][/color][/font][b][center][font=Georgia][color=#3c78d8][size=5]Check one of my other mods:[/size][/color]
[/font][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/77363-8-1469448941.png[/img]
[font=Georgia][color=#c9daf8][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77363/?]Black Cat - RaceMenu Preset[/url][/size][/color][/font][/center][/b]
author: Yourskyrim123
